component.name: TalkType
component.summary: AI-powered speech recognition and dictation for Wayland

description.p: TalkType is a powerful, privacy-focused speech-to-text application for Linux Wayland systems. Using OpenAI's Faster-Whisper AI model, TalkType provides accurate voice dictation with intelligent punctuation and formatting.
Press and hold a configurable hotkey (default F8) to start dictating, release to stop. Your spoken words are instantly transcribed and inserted at your cursor position in any application.

ul.li: High-accuracy AI transcription using Faster-Whisper models
Voice commands for punctuation (period, comma, question mark, etc.)
Multiple Whisper model sizes (tiny, base, small, medium, large)
Completely offline - no internet required after model download
Privacy-focused - all processing happens locally on your machine

screenshot.caption: Welcome screen with first-run setup guidance
Preferences window with GPU acceleration and model selection

description.p: Polished first-run experience with improved UX

ul.li: Simple modal dialog for hotkey changes (not full Preferences window)
Loop-back verification: after changing keys, immediately verify new keys
Progress dialog when downloading Whisper models
Fixed dialog timing: welcome screen now appears before hotkey verification
First run only marked complete after successful hotkey verification
